title: Report Suspected Meter Tampering
description: A field technician observes signs of tampering with an electric meter and needs to report it.

tasks.description: The technician documents the signs of tampering (e.g., broken seal, meter upside down) and takes photos.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician logs the details and evidence in their mobile work management app.

tasks.description: The system automatically flags the account for investigation by the revenue protection department.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a new investigation case.

tasks.description: Analyze the customer's historical usage for sudden, unexplained drops in consumption.
tasks.expected_outcome: System analysis shows a 70% drop in recorded consumption starting 3 months ago.
